name: Sayori Balloon!
description:
WARNING: Contains body inflation fetish content.

Contains no psychological horror content (unless you aren't into this kind of stuff).

I made this mini-game to celebrate hitting 1,000 downloads across my projects here on Itch.io. It features artwork by bo-the-sno, of Sayori from Doki Doki Literature Club getting pumped up like a balloon. Check out the original and more on his dA: https://www.deviantart.com/bo-the-sno

Controls:

Press R to reset
Mousewheel scrolls the viewpoint
Hit space or click the pump to pump
Press Z to toggle auto-pumping
Sayori can take 1,000 pumps before the tank runs out and the mini-game ends.

Sound effects are planned for a later date.

Thanks again to bo-the-sno for giving permission to use his art!
Thanks to all of you for taking an interest in my strange content!
